item.title: Wait, people actually use Facebook Dating?
item.description: Meta said that Facebook Dating has 1.77 million daily active users in the US between ages 18-29.

item.title: a16z pauses its famed TxO Fund for underserved founders, lays off staff
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz is pausing its Talent x Opportunity (TxO) fund and program, according to multiple sources.

item.title: Studio Ghibli and other Japanese publishers want OpenAI to stop training on their work
item.description: OpenAI's approach to working with copyrighted content is to ask forgiveness, not permission.
